salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: SELECT FIELDS(ALL) FROM Account WHERE cust_id__c = ':cust_id' LIMIT 200

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- [{ cust_id__c: lower(payload.personalInformation.firstName ++ payload.personalInformation.lastName[0]), Name: payload.personalInformation.firstName, Type: payload.personalInformation.lastName, Phone: payload.personalInformation.phone as String, Fax: payload.personalInformation.email, Website: payload.personalInformation.companyName }]

db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO customers (cust_id, firstName, lastName, companyName, email, phone, street, housenumber, city, country, postalCode) VALUES (:cust_id, :firstName, :lastName, :companyName, :email, :phone, :street, :houseNumber, :city, :country, :postalCode)
db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[{country: payload.address.country, city: payload.address.city, street: payload.address.street, postalCode: payload.address.postalCode, houseNumber: payload.address.houseNumber, firstName: payload.personalInformation.firstName, lastName: payload.personalInformation.lastName, phone: payload.personalInformation.phone, companyName: payload.personalInformation.companyName, email: payload.personalInformation.email, cust_id: vars.cust_id}]
